about_the_game:
SURVIVE THE LABYRINTH

Ahead are more than two hundred manually created areas from which levels are procedurally generated. Everything is teeming with deadly enemies who want to take your life. Reach the final boss and save the galaxy. Or choose your adventure path and see how long you can survive. Progression system that increases your power and the power of your enemies will during the game.

FIND POWERFUL ITEMS

Each new game will be different from previous ones thanks to collection of over 120 items. The more items you collect, the more interesting their effects will be. You can obtain items from enemies, buy in the store at the level or before starting a new adventure.

COMPLETE QUESTS AND EXPLORE THE UNIVERSE

An ancient race came from the galactic abyss. Their task is to turn the galaxy into their habitat. As you progress, you will encounter infection, anomalies and strange life forms. More than 60 different quests will allow you to get additional benefits and unlock story elements. Go all the way, learn all about your friends and enemies.

EXPLORE NEW TECHNOLOGIES

Get access to new spaceships, each with a unique fighting style. Uncover the secrets of artifacts and unique weapons. Each next walkthrough will allow you to find new items and rewards.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Exciting storyline.
  • Equipment system.
  • Leveling and research system.
  • Destructible and interactive environments, traps.
  • Over 40 weapon variants with different mechanics, 20 active items, 60 passive modifiers.
  • Procedurally generated levels.

name: Galaxy of Void: Bounty Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 / Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: An action-adventure roguelike with a bit of RPG tossed in. Shoot, defend, combine found items in an unexpected way. Complete contracts and uncover secrets to defeat the mysterious enemy. Ahead is a labyrinth filled with insidious dangers, anomalies and many rewards.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
